clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Malacidin A is being investigated for its antibiotic action and has potential for use as an antibacterial agent in the future A33312

contraindications.disease: Malacidin A has no observed toxicity or haemolytic effect on mammalian cells at concentrations of up to 100 250 μg mL over 100 times the MIC for affected pathogens A33312
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Malacidin A disrupts bacterial cell wall synthesis likely leading to cell death in Gram positive bacteria A33312 This bactericidal effect reduces the number of live bacteria present during infection Malacidin A has exhibited broad spectrum activity against Gram positive bacteria including several multi drug resistant pathogens

incompatibilities.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Picosulfuric acid can be decreased when used in combination with Malacidin A
The therapeutic efficacy of BCG vaccine can be decreased when used in combination with Malacidin A
The therapeutic efficacy of Typhoid vaccine can be decreased when used in combination with Malacidin A
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Malacidin A is combined with Dicoumarol
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Malacidin A is combined with Phenindione
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Malacidin A is combined with Warfarin
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Malacidin A is combined with Phenprocoumon
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Malacidin A is combined with Acenocoumarol
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Malacidin A is combined with 4 hydroxycoumarin
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Malacidin A is combined with Coumarin
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Malacidin A is combined with R warfarin
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Malacidin A is combined with Ethyl biscoumacetate
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Malacidin A is combined with Fluindione
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Malacidin A is combined with Clorindione
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Malacidin A is combined with Diphenadione
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Malacidin A is combined with Tioclomarol
The risk or severity of bleeding can be increased when Malacidin A is combined with S Warfarin
The therapeutic efficacy of Lactulose can be decreased when used in combination with Malacidin A
The therapeutic efficacy of Vibrio cholerae CVD 103 HgR strain live antigen can be decreased when used in combination with Malacidin A
